title: Rank QUes
body:
Get into a normal games lobby and it's all rainbows and kitty cats and everyone is cheerfully trading roles where needed.

Get into a rank lobby and it's an absolute mess of children on school holidays going full retard.

replies.body: I find that even in Normal Queues there are also many rude players. But, not as much as in Ranked. Over time I've just learnt to ignore it and enjoy the game.
For some reason I have the opposite experience...

> [{quoted}](name=Tweekerz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YI4NbOFP,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-13T01:21:41.978+0000)
>
> Get into a normal games lobby and it's all rainbows and kitty cats and everyone is cheerfully trading roles where needed.
> 
> Get into a rank lobby and it's an absolute mess of children on school holidays going full %%%%%%.

Never a truer sentence hath been uttered.
The trick is to play when all the twelvies are at school or in bed ❤
